definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
periodic table (chemistry)/abbr. of 元素週期表|元素周期表[yuan2 su4 zhou1 qi1 biao3], periodic table of the elements

sentences.english: We can measure half a period.
The subject of any other monograph must comply throughout its period of use.
sentences.chinese: 任何另外的專論的內容必須遵守其使用週期。

sentences.english: Why do we call it the Periodic Table?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們叫它週期表？

sentences.english: It can be compared with the periodic abstractor in the continuous dynamics.
sentences.chinese: 這對應於連續動力學系統中的週期吸引子。

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年週期振動爲主，其次是半年週期。

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年週期振動爲主，其次是半年週期。

sentences.english: Generics can help you resolve coding problems earlier in the development cycle.
sentences.chinese: 泛型可以幫助您在開發週期的早期解決編碼問題。

sentences.english: Early in the development lifecycle, one uses simulation and analysis tools.
sentences.chinese: 在開發週期的前期階段，使用仿真和分析工具。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of somatostatin in uterus and blood of mouse during genesis cycle.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小鼠生殖週期子宮和血生長抑素的變化。

sentences.english: Certain stages and periodicities existed in the variation of water resources.
sentences.chinese: 水資源的變化存在一定的階段性和週期性。

sentences.english: The periodic solution can be bifurcated from equilibrium point with the variation of parameters.
sentences.chinese: 系統隨着參數的變化，從平衡點分岔出週期解。

sentences.english: In other words, look at the entire life cyle.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，要考慮到整個生命週期。

sentences.english: On the right side of the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 元素週期表的右半部分。

sentences.english: What pre-cycle screening tests are required, how much do they cost, and will my insurance provide coverage for these tests?
sentences.chinese: 預備週期要做哪些篩選實驗，費用多少，保險有用嗎？

sentences.english: Development governance encompasses the software development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 開發治理圍繞着軟件開發生命週期。

sentences.english: The thermostable conditions of Periodic resonators is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還討論了週期性諧振腔的熱穩條件問題。

to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
